definition: essence/extract/vitality/energy/semen/sperm/mythical goblin spirit/highly perfected/elite/the pick of sth/proficient (refined ability)/extremely (fine)/selected rice (archaic)

sentences.english: Milk essence is the main ingredient in bubble tea.
One cube of sugar and low-fat cream, please.
sentences.chinese: 只要一顆糖跟低脂奶精就好。

sentences.english: Do you take sugar or milk?
Would you like some cream in your coffee?
I would like a cup of decaf with cream and no sugar.
sentences.chinese: 我要一杯低咖啡因的咖啡，加奶精，不加糖。

sentences.english: Ok. How about cream and sugar?
sentences.chinese: 好的，要不要來點奶精和糖？

sentences.english: The color of the coffee with cream is brown.
sentences.chinese: 有奶精的咖啡顏色是棕色的。

sentences.english: The main ingredient of milk essence is hydrogenated vegetable oil, a type of trans fats.
sentences.chinese: 奶精的主要成分氫化植物油是一種反式脂肪酸。

sentences.english: So I gave up coffee Kramer did not product crack, now.
sentences.chinese: 於是我放棄了咖啡伴侶奶精裂紋副產品，現在。

sentences.english: Could you give me a coffee with extra packets of cream and sugar?
sentences.chinese: 可不可以給我一杯咖啡，並多給一包奶精和糖呢？

sentences.english: Please put cream in her coffee.
sentences.chinese: 請在她的咖啡里加奶精。

sentences.english: Just avoid all the sugar and milk!
sentences.chinese: 前提是不加任何的糖和奶精。

sentences.english: Do you take sugar and cream?
Oops! I put in too much cream.
Milk essence (dairy creamer) is the main ingredient in bubble tea.

definition: pearl milk tea/tapioca milk tea/bubble milk tea
